    • Method Detail

      • check

        public void check(ILexLocation execl,
                  Context ctxt)
        Description copied from class: Breakpoint
        Check whether to stop. The implementation in Breakpoint is used to check for the "step" and "next" commands, using the stepline, nextctxt and outctxt fields. If the current line is different to the last step line, and the current context is not "above" the next context or the current context equals the out context or neither the next or out context are set, a Stoppoint is created and its check method is called - which starts a DebuggerReader session.
        Overrides:
        check in class Breakpoint
        Parameters:
        execl - The execution location.
        ctxt - The execution context.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Breakpoint
